act:
937489 THE UTTAR PRADESH APPROPRIATION (VOTE ON ACCOUNT)
ACT NO. 2 ACT, 1996 NO. 32 OF 1996 [ 23rd September, 1996]
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Forty- seventh Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
An Act to provide for the withdrawal of certain sum' s from and out of the Consolidated Fund of the State of Uttar Pradesh for the services of a part of the financial year 1996- 97.
102347 1Short title. This Act may be called the Uttar Pradesh Appropriation (Vote on Account) No. 2 Act, 1996.
256057 2Withdrawal of Rs. 20948, 42, 10, 000 from and out of the Consolidated Fund of the State of Uttar Pradesh for the financial year 1996- 97. From and out of the Consolidated Fund of the State of Uttar Pradesh there may be withdrawn sums not exceeding those specified in column 3 of the Schedule amounting in the aggregate[ inclusive of the sums specified in column 3 of the Schedule to the Uttar Pradesh Appropriation (Vote on Account) Act, 1996] (11 of 1996.) to the sum of twenty thousand nine hundred and forty- eight crores, forty- two lakhs and ten thousand rupees towards defraying the several charges which will come in course of payment during the financial year 1996- 97 in respect of the services specified in column 2 of the Schedule.
1647692 3Appropriation. The sums authorised to be withdrawn from and out of the Consolidated Fund of the State of Uttar Pradesh by this Act shall be appropriated for the services and purposes expressed in the Schedule in relation to the said year.
